column2: ENGLISH
The secretiveness of a nonhuman courtier has made me suspect him of being a Squirrel supporter.
Ask him if he really is a Squirrel.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is confronted by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
I should tell others about my suspicion!
All courtiers will suspect [This.GetTitledFirstName] of being a Squirrel
I will accept money in exchange for my silence.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is blackmailed by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
[From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me today if I really am a Scoiatael supporter!
What nerve! I would never join those rebels!
You are right. I do support the Scoiatael.
Everyone at court believes I am a Scoiatael supporter!
Why?

A note left on my table by an unseen visitor told me that if I did not deliver fifty gold within one hour to [From.GetTitledFirstName], my secret would be a secret no more. A small post scriptum wrote: 'you Squirrel scum'.
I cannot let anyone believe that!
No one will believe that!
A non-human courtier has been very secretive and somentimes even disappear for a while. Might it be that he is a Squirrel supporter?
I will accuse him of being a Squirrel supporter!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is accused of being a Squirrel supporter by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
It is my duty to inform everyone about this suspected Squirrel!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] started questioning me about my activities, asked what I' hiding and so on. My answers did not seem to satisfy [From.GetHerHim] and finally [From.GetSheHe] blurted out [From.GetHerHis] question: was I a Squirrel supporter?
What!? No! No, I am not a Squirrel supporter!
Yes, I am a Scoiatael supporter.
The rumors aboaut me being a Squirrel supporter would stop if spent more of my time in company of humans.
Actually it could be good, maybe I will even make new friends.
I don't want to sped time with those savages.
It seems like my personality is the fault of the rumors about me being a Squirrel supporter. If I think about it it is reasonable that no one would trust me.
I will be more honest from now on!
Honesty has never done anyone any good.
It seems like my personality is the fault of the rumors about me being a Squirrel supporter. I am always being careful like hiding someone and always doubting everybody.
I will stop being so paranoid, it's not like everyone is after me.
No, it's too risky.
The magical talent of Court Mage [Root.job_mage.GetTitledFirstName] is meager! No matter what task I give [Root.job_mage.GetHerHim] [Root.job_mage.GetSheHe] always manage to disappoint.
You are not good enough, you have to shape up!
[Root.job_mage.GetTitledFirstName] is chastised about [Root.job_mage.GetHerHis] lack of magical talent
I don't trust [Root.job_mage.GetTitledFirstName] to do a good job.
All courtiers will know that [Root.GetTitledFirstName] does not trust Court Mage [This.GetTitledFirstName]
[Root.job_mage.GetTitledFirstName] lack of magic talent has cost me dearly!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] claims my magic talent is meager! No matter how hard I work, [From.GetTitledFirstName] is never satisfied and [From.GetHerHis] demands are preposterous!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] does not appreciate me...
[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s distrust in me as [From.GetHerHis]  Court Magician has made everyone in court dislike me!
What have I done?
